channel.title: [718] OpenX RSPS | SpawnPk | Active Forums & Much More!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/3665/bkmy.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://openxpk.org/community/"][B]Forums[/B][/URL] | [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/yyfv3gmxmjh2ejq/OpenX%20Client%20v3.jar][B]Download[/B][/url][/CENTER]
[U][B]Our Community[/B][/U]; OpenX is a nice and friendly community welcoming all players from around the RSPS world! Our community focuses on helping each other out and enjoying the time here on OpenX! With tons of players active on forums on a daily basis, we all have a laugh and get along. We are all one big family! Our developers are always online and constantly updating our forums and the server almost daily. With our active developers, the community can get what they want, when they want! With outstanding skills and exp for skillers and insane switching for pking, pking is made just perfect for those who 'can't pk' while skilling is all about having fun with others and competing. Check out our forums and take a look: [url=http://openxpk.org/community/]OpenX RSPS[/url]. Here at OpenX we strive to make your journey a better and interesting one. Focusing on what you like the most here, your voice counts.
[U][B]Features[/B][/U]; - Perfect Item Switching - New Hitmarks with critical hits - Fully working Ancient Curses - New Bank & Shop Interfaces - Fast loading client with low memory usage - Bonfire! - Fast skill leveling! - Great mage+combat system - No lag! - Love the style but hate the new look? ::switchitemslook to the old look to have a better liking. - Donator status+abilities! -([I]more coming soon[/I])
[U][B]Server[/B][/U]; - Dedicated server - Many Bug Fixes. - Extreme Donators can change their yell whenever they want to whatever they want from a command like ::setyell. Eg: ::setyell best pker - Updated Maps (Inc GE) - Active forums! - Instant PK'ing - The most hilarious community known to any RSPS! - Webclient still in developing progress. - Dedicated Developers. - Nice and helpful staff members. -([I]more coming soon[/I]) [U][B]
Soon to come[/B][/U]; - Most skills working, more coming soon! - Full PvM - Advanced DDOS protection - Extra Ranks - Improving the PK’ing experience. - Whatever the community wants! -([I]more coming soon[/I])
Media:
[IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/4826/26i8.png[/img] [IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/1324/desw.png[/img] [IMG]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/876/jfbr.png[/img] [IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/5160/0hz3.png[/img] [IMG]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/3995/6a8x.png[/img] (Will be posting more pictures/videos soon, its late night and I'm dead tired atm)
Interested in joining the family? Hope to see you there ;)!
Download the client here: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/yyfv3gmxmjh2ejq/OpenX%20Client%20v3.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/yyfv3gmxmjh2ejq/OpenX%20Client%20v3.jar[/url]
Visit our active forums: [url=http://openxpk.org/community/]OpenX RSPS[/url]
Hope to see some new friendly faces around.

item.title: [718] OpenX RSPS | SpawnPk | Active Forums & Much More!
item.dc:creator: @H0z H0z
item.description:
@H0z wrote:

[CENTER]
Forums | Download[/CENTER]

Our Community;
OpenX is a nice and friendly community welcoming all players from around the RSPS world! Our community focuses on
helping each other out and enjoying the time here on OpenX! With tons of players active on forums on a daily basis, we
all have a laugh and get along. We are all one big family! Our developers are always online and constantly updating our
forums and the server almost daily. With our active developers, the community can get what they want, when
they want! With outstanding skills and exp for skillers and insane switching for pking, pking is made just perfect for those who ‘can’t pk’ while skilling is all about having fun with others and competing. Check out our forums and take a look: OpenX RSPS. Here at OpenX we strive to make your journey a better and interesting one. Focusing on what you like the most here, your voice counts.

Features;

  • Perfect Item Switching
  • New Hitmarks with critical hits
  • Fully working Ancient Curses
  • New Bank & Shop Interfaces
  • Fast loading client with low memory usage
  • Bonfire!
  • Fast skill leveling!
  • Great mage+combat system
  • No lag!
  • Love the style but hate the new look? ::switchitemslook to the old look to have a better liking.
  • Donator status+abilities!
    -(more coming soon)

Server;

  • Dedicated server
  • Many Bug Fixes.
  • Extreme Donators can change their yell whenever they want to whatever they want from a command like ::setyell. Eg:
    ::setyell best pker
  • Updated Maps (Inc GE)
  • Active forums!
  • Instant PK’ing
  • The most hilarious community known to any RSPS!
  • Webclient still in developing progress.
  • Dedicated Developers.
  • Nice and helpful staff members.
    -(more coming soon)
    [U][B]

Soon to come[/B][/U];

  • Most skills working, more coming soon!
  • Full PvM
  • Advanced DDOS protection
  • Extra Ranks
  • Improving the PK’ing experience.
  • Whatever the community wants!
    -(more coming soon)

Media:






(Will be posting more pictures/videos soon, its late night and I’m dead tired atm)

Interested in joining the family? Hope to see you there ;)!

Download the client here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/yyfv3gmxmjh2ejq/OpenX%20Client%20v3.jar

Visit our active forums:
OpenX RSPS

Hope to see some new friendly faces around.
